messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Rokuro Kubi / Dictionaries
messages.msgSnippet: I simply cannot live without my Nelson s I use O Neill s Japanese Names quite a bit and after that I move to Japanese references. I am not a student of the
messages.messageBody:
I simply cannot live without my Nelson's
I use O'Neill's Japanese Names quite a bit and after that I move to
Japanese references. I am not a student of the language so much as of
swords and history, there are sure to be others with better
recommendations here...
-t
Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil

> -t

>

> you just have a better dictionary!
>
> Speaking of which -- is there a particular one you'd recommend?
>
> --RMB
